title: Her Least Favorite Husband
description: Being on trial for murder should be the worst thing that can happen.But receiving an invitation to her own wedding takes the cake.It was never going to be the happiest day of Mia’s life, but it could have been better if she knew about it more than a week in advance. Now she has to say “I do” because saying “I don’t” would be a sure way to lose her fingers and toes.And after it’s done, there’s no going back. Divorce is not an option. She was raised to believe marriage lasts a lifetime. The only bright side is knowing that his life doesn’t need to last forever.**This is a full-length 80,000 word novel and contains themes some readers may find upsetting. Please be aware of toxic behavior, questionable parenting, consent of the fuzzy variety, explicit scenes, violence, and moral ambiguity.**
author: Magdalin Laine
